name: Macro Oscillator 2
description: This algorithm is an implementation of the open source Plaits (https://github.com/pichenettes/eurorack/tree/master/plaits) [83] module by Ã‰milie Gillet. This implementation should behave and sound identical to the original. Any demos or tutorials you may find online should apply just as well to this version. The user manual for the original module is https://pichenettes.github.io/mutable-instruments-documentation/modules/plaits/manual/ [84]. The documentation below assumes some familiarity with this. This version of the disting NT firmware is based on v1.2 of the Plaits code.
